Title: Trump's Smackdown of Zelensky Wake-up Call for a West Too ‘Accustomed to Political Correctness’
Description: The fierce clash between President Trump and Volodymyr Zelensky on live TV shocked US allies and prompted devastated Washington pundits to start writing requiems to 'Pax Americana'. Sputnik reached out to a pair of veteran observers of international politics and defense policy to explain the blowup, and what comes next.

Title: Strategic Asset: What are Russia's Rare Metals Reserves?

Title: Pepe Escobar: From Donbass to South Lebanon, and All Across BRICS, It’s All About Resistance

Title: Good Riddance to Bad Rubbish: Why the Five Eyes Alliance Should Be Dismantled

Title: $1.5 Billion for 32 Trials: How Efficient is the International Criminal Court?
